juzs.text: tie ne est creature ter provision ne garanti DI. Kaj Li kon its kurs its final destiny. All est recorded profound record

Li est Unu kre heavens ter 6 tag - His (earthly) domain completely kovr kun akv! - en ord al test vi disting those vi work righteousness! sed when vi dir Vi resurrected death those disbelieve dir This est clearly witchcraft
Kaj se ni delay retribution ili incurred - Por ni rezerv gxi specif community - Ili dir Ki keeping Him? En fakt, once gxi ven them nothing stop gxi their mok vol ven haunt them
Whenever ni ben human est kun mercy us tiam remove gxi li turn despondent unappreciative
Whenever ni ben him adversity aflikt him li dir All adversity ir me li igx ekscit fier
As por those who steadfastly persevere plumb righteous life ili ind forgiveness generous recompense
Vi wish disregard kelk da which revealed vi vi annoyed gxi! Ankaux ili dir "Kiel ven neni trezor ven him angxel? Vi est nur warner; DI controls all ajx
Ili dir Li fabricated (Quran) tell them Tiam produkt 10 suras like these fabricated invit whomever vi can DI vi est truthful
Ili fail meet your challenge tiam kon ti this revealed di knowledge kaj ke tie ne est di escept Li! Vi tiam submit
Those pursue this worldly life its sxtof vanities ni pag them their works en this life malplej reduction
est ili don up their akci Hereafter consequently Infer est their lot! All their works est en vain cxio ili done nullified

As por those don solid proof el their Lord raport witness el Him kaj gxi libr Moses set precedent mercy ili surely kred. As por those disbelieve various grup Infer awaiting them. Ne haven any dub; this est truth your Lord plej popol disbelieve
Who evil than those est fabricate mensog DI? Ili prezent their Lord witnesses dir These est unu who lied their Lord Di condemnation befallen transgressors
Ili repel voj DI streb far gxi crooked ili est disbelievers Hereafter
These neniam escape nor vol ili trov any lords mastr help them kontraux DI! Retribution doubled them. Ili failed auxd ili failed seg
These est unu perd their anim idols ili fabricated disown them
tie est ne dub ke Hereafter ili est mav losers
As por those kred plumb righteous life devote their Lord ili est dwellers Paradise; ili abide therein forever
Ekzempl these 2 grup est blind surd kompar al seer hearer! Ili est egal? Vi ne pren heed
Ni send Noah his popol dir mi ven vi klar warner
Vi ne worship DI. Mi tim por vi retribution painful tag
Estr disbelieved his popol dir Ni seg vi est ne plur than human est us ni seg ke 1 popol sekv vi est des mav among us! Ni seg vi ne posed any avantagx us. Ja ni pens vi est liars
Li dir O my popol ki mi hav solid proof el my Lord ki se Li ben me His mercy vi ne seg gxi? Ni ir force vi est kred therein
(O my popol mi ne pet vi any mon; my wage ven nur el DI. Mi ne dismissing those kred; ili meet their Lord Li sol jugx them)! Mi seg vi est ignorant popol
O my popol support me DI mi dismiss them? Vi ne pren heed

(Mi ne pretend mi posed trezor DI nor do mi kon future nor do mi pretend est angxel. Nor do mi dir al those despised your okul ke DI testament ne bestow any blessings them! DI kon PUT KI est their innermost thoughts! Mi did this) mi est transgressor
Ili dir O Noah vi argued us kept arguing Ni challenge vi bring doom vi minac us vi est truthful
Li dir DI est Unu brings gxi vi se Li vol tiam vi ne escape
Eben se mi advised vi my advice ne benefit vi gxi est di testament send vi astray! Li est your Lord Him vi returned
Ili dir Li far up this fabel tiam dir mi far tiam mi est responsible my krim mi est innocent de any krim vi commit
Noah ne inspir de your popol kred beyond those jam kred! Ne saddened their actions
Cxarpent ark our watchful okul our inspiration ne implore Me sur behalf da those transgressed ili destin dron
While li cxarpent ark whenever kelk da his popol pas him ili rid him. Li dir Vi rid us ni rid vi just as vi rid
Vi do gxi surely trov out who sufer shameful retribution incur everlasting punishment
When our judgment ven atmosphere bol over ni dir Port gxi par de each kind together kun your famili those kondamn! Port vi those kred nur a few kred him
Li dir Ven sur board En des nom da DI est its vel its mooring My Lord est Forgiver Merciful
As gxi vel them en ond like hills Noah vok his fil izol O my fil ven rajd us do ne est disbelievers
(Li dir mi pren rifugx hill protekt me akv. Li dir Nothing protekt anyone hodiaux di judgment nur those worthy His mercy sav.) ond apart them li est among those dron
Gxi proklam O ter glut your akv O cxiel cxes akv tiam subsided judgment fulfilled ark finally ripoz sur hills Judea. Gxi tiam proklam transgressors pere
Noah implored his Lord My Lord my fil est member de my famili Your promes est truth. Vi est sagx de des sagx
Li dir O Noah li ne est de your famili. est unrighteous pet Me io vi ne kon! Mi enlighten vi lest vi est des ignorant
Li dir My Lord mi streb rifugx Vi lest mi implore Vi re io mi ne kon. Vi forgive me hav mercy me mi est losers
Gxi proklam O Noah disembark pac blessings vi naci descend your companions. As por ali naci descending el vi ni ben them por awhile tiam commit them painful retribution
This est news preter ni reveal vi. Vi ne hav knowledge them - Nek vi nor your popol - Antaux this. Do est pacient. ultimate victory aparten al des righteous
Al â€˜Aad ni send their frat Hood Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi invent
O my popol mi ne pet vi any wage My wage ven nur 1 who iniciat me Vi ne kompren
O my popol streb forgiveness your Lord tiam pent Him. Li tiam dusx vi provisions cxiel eg your strength! Ne turn transgressors
Ili dir O Hood vi ne montr us any proof ni ne abandoning our di sur kont da ki vi dir. Ni neniam est believers vi
Ni kred kelk da our di aflikt vi curse Li dir mi bor witness DI vi bor witness ankaux mi disown idols vi set
beside Him. Tial don me your collective decision sen delay
Mi put my fid DI my Lord your Lord tie ne est creature Li ne control My Lord est dekstr path
Vi turn mi liver vi ki mi send kun. My Lord substitute ali popol en your ej; vi ne harm Him en des malplej My Lord est en control de all ajx
When our judgment ven ni sav Hood those kred him mercy us. Ni sav them terrible retribution
Such est â€˜Aad - Ili disregarded revelations their Lord disobeyed His messengers sekv voj cxiu stubborn tiran
Consequently ili incurred condemnation en this mond Tag Resurrection. Ja â€˜Aad rejected their Lord Ja â€˜Aad popol Hood pere

Al Thamoud ni send their frat Saaleh. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Li iniciat vi ter tiam sald vi en gxi. Vi streb His forgiveness tiam pent Him. My Lord est cxiam proksim responsive
Ili dir O Saaleh vi uz est popular among us this. Vi enjoining us el worshipping ki our parents worshipping Ni est plen de dub cxio vi told us
Li dir O my popol ki mi hav solid proof el my Lord mercy Him? Who support me DI mi disobeyed Him? Vi nur eg my loss
O my popol this est di kamel serv proof vi. Vi let her mangx di ter do ne tusx her any harm lest vi incur immediate retribution
Ili bucx her. Li tiam dir Vi hav nur 3 tag viv This est prophecy est inevitable
When our judgment ven ni sav Saaleh those kred him mercy us humiliation ke tag. Your Lord est plej Powerful Almighty
Those transgressed annihilated disaster las them their hejm dead
Est as se ili neniam viv tie. Ja Thamoud rejected their Lord Absolutely Thamoud incurred their annihilation
When our messengers ir Abraham bon news ili dir Pac. Li dir Pac baldaux brought rost calf
When li seg their man ne tusx gxi li igx suspicious fearful de them. Ili dir est afraid ni depesx popol Lot
His wife star sxi rid when ni don her bon news Isaac post Isaac Jacob
Sxi dir Ve me kiel mi bor infan my agx here est my husband old hom? This est really strang
Ili dir vi trov gxi strang por DI? DI bestowed His mercy blessings VI O inhabitants shrine Li est Praiseworthy Glorious
When Abraham's tim subsided bon news liver him li proced argue us sur behalf da Lot's popol
Ja Abraham est clement extremely kind obedient
O Abraham refrain el this. Your Lord's judgment issued ili incurred unavoidable retribution
When our messengers ir Lot ili mistreated li embarrassed their presence. Li dir This est difficult tag
His popol ven rushing; ili kresk kutim al their sinful akt! Li dir O my popol est pur vi se vi sorb my daughters instead Vi reverence DI; do ne embarrass me my gast! Hav vi ne unu reasonable hom vi
Ili dir Vi kon put ti ni hav ne bezon your daughters; vi kon exactly ki ni want
Li dir Mi wish mi est fort suficx hav powerful ally

(Angxel) dir O Lot ni est your Lord's messengers these popol ne tusx vi. Vi las your famili nokt let ne anyone de vi rigard dors your wife; sxi kondamn along kun those kondamn. Their appointed temp est maten. Ne est maten baldaux suficx
When our judgment ven ni torn upside down ni dusx gxi hard devastating rok
Such rok designated your Lord strik transgressors
Al Midyan ni send their frat Shu aib. Li dir O my popol worship DI; vi ne hav ali di Him. Ne cheat when vi mezur pes! Mi seg vi est prosperous mi tim vi retribution overwhelming tag
O my popol vi don plen mezur plen weight equitably! Ne cheat popol their dekstr ne roam ter corruptingly
Whatever DI proviz por vi ne materi kiel small est far put vi se vi est really believers. Mi ne est guardian over vi
Ili dir O Shu aib your religi dikt vi ke ni abandon our parents' religi dev kur our negoc any manier ni choose Surely vi kon por est clement sagx

Li dir O my popol ki mi hav solid proof el my Lord ki Li proviz me great ben Ne est my wish commit ki mi enjoin vi el. Mi nur wish korekt many wrongs as mi can My guidance depends totally DI; mi put my fid Him. Al Him mi totally submitted
Kaj O my popol ne provoked your opposition me into incurring sam disasters popol Noah popol de Hood popol de Saaleh; popol Lot ne est tro far el vi
Vi implore your Lord forgiveness tiam pent Him. My Lord est Merciful Kind
Ili dir O Shu aib ni ne comprehend many da ajx vi telling us ni seg vi est powerless among us. Se ne est your gent ni sxton vi. Vi ne hav value us
Li dir O my popol my gent komand greater respekt than DI? this why vi est est heedless de Him? My Lord est fully aware da cxio vi do
O my popol ir sur doing ki vi wish kaj tial vol mi! Vi do gxi certainly trov out which de us incur shameful retribution; vi do gxi trov out who liar est Just wait anticipation mi wait anticipation vi
When our judgment ven ni sav Shu aib those kred him mercy us. As por evil unu ili strik disaster ke las them dead en their hejm
Est as kvankam ili neniam ekzist. Do Midyan pere just like Thamoud pere antaux ke
Ni send Moses our sign profound auxtoritat
Al Pharaoh his elders Ili sekv ordon Pharaoh Pharaoh's ordon ne est sagx
Li plumb his popol Tag Resurrection all des voj al Infer; ki miserable abode al viv en
Ili incurred condemnation en this life ankaux as sur Tag Resurrection; ki miserable path sekv
This est news preter communities ni narrate vi. Kelk est ankoraux bud kelk vanished
Ni neniam wronged them; ili wronged their own anim. Their di ili invoked DI ne help them en des malplej when judgment your Lord ven. En fakt, ili nur ensured their doom
Such retribution enforced your Lord when communities transgressed Ja His retribution est painful devastating
This est lecion those tim retribution Hereafter Ke est tag when all popol summoned - Tag witnessed
Ni appointed specif temp gxi sorb met
Tag gxi ven ne pas anim utter single vort en accordance kun His vol! Kelk est miserable kelk est felicx
As por miserable unu ili est Infer wherein ili sigh wail
Eternally ili abide therein as long as heavens ter endure en accordance kun vol your Lord Your Lord est doer de whatever Li vol
As por fortunate unu ili est Paradise. Eternally ili abide therein as long as heavens ter endure en accordance kun vol your Lord - everlasting rekompenc
Ne hav any dub regarding ki these popol worship ili worship exactly as ili trov their parents worshipping Ni requite them their due akci fully reduction
Ni don Moses scripture gxi disput kaj gxi est por predetermined vort dekret your Lord ili jugx tuj! Ili est plen de dub pri this suspicious
Your Lord surely recompense everyone their works Li est fully Cognizant de cxio ili do
Do ad path vi enjoined sekv together those pent vi ne transgress! Li est Seer de cxio vi do
Ne apog towards those transgressed lest vi incur Infer trov neni allies help vi DI tiam end losers
Vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) ambaux ends de tag nokt. righteous works visx evil works This est reminder those pren heed
Vi steadfastly persevere DI neniam fails recompense des righteous
Se nur kelk da those among previous generaci posed suficx intelligence forbid evil Nur a few da them ind sav us! As por transgressors ili preoccupied their sxtof luks; ili est kulp
Your Lord neniam annihilates any community unjustly while its popol est righteous
(Hav your Lord willed all popol est 1 congregation believers)! Ili cxiam disput (truth)
(Nur those ben kun mercy el your Lord ne disput truth)! This why Li kre them. judgment your Lord jam issued mi fill Infer jinns humans all together
Ni narrate vi suficx histori messengers strengthen your kor truth ven vi herein tro as enlightenments reminders believers
Dir al those disbelieve Do whatever vi can kaj tial do gxi ni
Tiam wait ni tro wait
Al DI aparten future de heavens ter all materi controlled Him! Vi worship Him fid Him. Your Lord est neniam unaware de anything vi do
R. These (liter) est proofs this profound scripture
Ni revealed gxi Arabic Quran vi kompren
Ni narrate vi plej accurate histori revelation de this Quran. Antaux this vi est totally unaware
Recall ti Joseph dir al his patr O my patr mi seg 11 planed sun lun; mi seg them prostrating me
Li dir My fil ne tell your frat your songx lest ili plot scheme vi. Surely diabl est hom mav enemy
Your Lord tiel ben vi don vi bon news your songx! Li perfekt His blessings vi famili Jacob as Li did por your ancestors Abraham Isaac antaux ke. Your Lord est Omniscient Sagx
En Joseph his frat tie est lecion seekers
Ili dir Joseph his frat komplez our patr ni est majority! Ja our patr est far astray
kill Joseph banish him ke vi get kelk attention el your patr! Afterwards vi est righteous popol
de them dir ne kill Joseph; jxet him abism put! Perhaps kelk karavan pik him this est ki vi decid do
Ili dir Our patr vi ne fid us Joseph? Ni pren bon zorg de him
Send him us morgaux kur lud! Ni protekt him
Li dir mi worry lest vi ir him tiam lup devour him while vi ne watching him
Ili dir Ja lup devours him many da us around tiam ni est really losers
When ili ir him kaj unanimously decid jxet him into abism put ni inspir him "Kelk tag vi tell them all this while ili ne hav ide
Ili ven their patr en des vesper plor
Ili dir Our patr ni ir racing each ali las Joseph our equipment lup devoured him! Vi neniam kred us eben ni telling truth
Ili produkt his cxemiz fake sang gxi. Li dir Ja vi konspir each ali al commit nepr scheme All mi do est resort kviet pacienc. Maj DI help me en des vizagx de your conspiracy
Karavan pas baldaux send their waterer! Li let his sitel tiam dir Kiel lucky tie est knab here! Ili pren him along merchandise DI est fully aware da ki ili did
Ili vend him cheap prez - a few dirhams - Por ili ne hav any bezon por him
Unu acxet him Egypt dir al his wife Pren bon zorg de him. Maybe li help us maybe ni adopt him. Ni do establ Joseph ter ni instru him interpretation de songx! Di ordon cxiam done plej popol ne kon
When li reached maturity ni dot him kun wisdom knowledge. Ni tiel rekompenc des righteous
lady dom li viv pen seduce him! Sxi closed pord dir mi est all yours. Li dir maj DI protekt me Li est my Lord don me bon hejm. transgressors neniam sukces
Sxi preskaux succumbed him kaj li preskaux succumbed her se ne est li seg proof el his Lord Ni tiel diverted evil pek for him li est 1 de our devoted servants
de them raced pord process sxi larm his garment el dors. Ili trov her husband pord. Sxi dir Ki punishment 1 who wanted molest your wife imprisonment painful punishment
Li dir Sxi est unu pen seduce me witness el her famili sugest his garment est larm el front tiam sxi telling truth li est liar
Kaj se his garment est larm el dors tiam sxi lied li telling truth
When her husband seg his garment est larm el dors li dir This est woman's scheme Ja your scheming est formidable
Joseph disregard this incident As por vi (my wife) vi streb forgiveness your pek. Vi committed error
Kelk women urb gossiped governor's wife est pen seduce her servant! Sxi est deeply en am him! Ni seg sxi ir astray

When sxi auxd their gossip sxi invit them prepar them komfort met don each da them knife Sxi tiam dir al him Enter their cxambr When ili seg him ili admir him ke ili fason their man. Ili dir Glory est al DI this ne est human est this est honorable angxel
Sxi dir This est 1 vi blamed me fal en am kun! Mi did ja pen seduce him li rifuz! Li does ki mi komand him do li surely ir prison debased
Li dir My Lord prison est put than don them. Vi divert their scheming me mi dezir them behave like ignorant unu
His Lord respond his prayer diverted their scheming el him. Li est Hearer Omniscient
Later ili seg gxi klar proofs ti ili imprison him por awhile
(jun hom est prison him. 1 de them dir mi seg my songx) mi far vin ali dir mi seg port pan my kap el which bird mangx! Inform us de interpretation these songx! Ni seg vi est righteous
Li dir any food proviz vi mi inform vi gxi vi ricev gxi! This est kelk da knowledge bestowed upon me my Lord Mi forsaken religi de popol who ne kred en DI regard Hereafter ili est really disbelievers
Mi sekv instead religi my ancestors Abraham Isaac Jacob. Ni neniam set any idols DI. Such est ben el DI us upon popol plej popol est unappreciative
O my prison mates est several di put DI sol 1 Supreme
Vi ne worship Him innovations vi hav far up vi your parents DI NENIAM authorized such idols. All regul aparten al DI Li regul ti vi ne worship Him! This est perfekt religi plej popol ne kon
O my prison mates 1 de vi est vin butler his lord while ali crucified - Bird mangx his kap. This sald materi which vi inquired
Li tiam dir al 1 sav Memor me je your lord Tiel diabl kauxz him forges his Lord consequently li ceter en prison a few mult jar
(Regx dir mi seg 7 fat cows devoured 7 skinny cows 7 verd spikes tritik) others shriveled O my elders advise me regarding my songx vi kon kiel interpret songx
Ili dir Nonsense songx. When gxi ven interpretation de songx ni est knowledgeable
(Unu sav prison) dir nun li finally memor mi tell vi its interpretation tial send me Joseph
Joseph my amik inform us 7 fat cows devoured 7 skinny cows 7 verd spikes others shriveled Mi wish al ir kelk information popol
Li dir Ki vi kultiv next 7 jar when temp rikolt ven las gren their spikes escept por ki vi mangx
Post ke, 7 jar drought ven which vol konsum plej de ki vi stored them
Post ke, jar ven brings relief popol ili re prem suk
Regx dir Bring him me When messenger ven him li dir Ir your lord pet him investigate women fason their man! My Lord est fully aware da their schemes

(Regx) dir (al women Ki do vi kon incident when vi pen seduce Joseph? Ili dir "DI forbid ni ne kon de anything evil committed per him. wife governor dir Nun truth prevailed Mi est unu pen seduce him li est truthful)
Mi esper li realize ke mi neniam perfid him his absence DI ne ben schemes betrayers
